# Position Eligibility
```{r}
(get_players(50) -> tst_results)

tst_results %>%
  select(starts_with("eligible_positions")) %>%
  transpose() %>%
  lapply(as.character) %>%
  lapply(function(x) x[!is.na(x)]) -> pos_complete

# add list rows representing new column as new column on prior df?
tst_results %>%
  add_column(pos_complete) %>%
  select(1, pos_complete)



```
